Articles.Content: A newbie welcome and hello to all site members.

Hello Aaronfinch123, and welcome to the forums!

We welcome all newbies to our excellent community. Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!

Hello, Aaronfinch123!

Just a tip: you might want to stop by the [Name Change Thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122939-The-Name-Change-Thread-%28WARNING!-ONE-TIME-ONLY!%29), if Aaron Finch is your IRL name. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Happy landings!
Welcome to the forums! Don't worry, we don't bite. Usually. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
